```{r}
data <- read.csv("100iterations_type3.csv_startN15", header=TRUE,sep=",")
str(data)

library(ggplot2)


# Assuming your data is stored in a data frame named 'df'

# Plot all iterations as light grey lines
ggplot(df, aes(x = Time, y = Pop_size, group = rep)) +
  geom_line(color = "lightgrey") +
  
# Plot the mean as a dark/black line
  stat_summary(fun = "mean", geom = "line", aes(group = 1), color = "black", size = 1) +

# Add labels and title
  labs(x = "Time", y = "Population Size", title = "Population Size Over Time")

```
